name: Constellation Metropole
title: Constellation Metropole
desc: "The heroes gazed upon the skies of gray, and in carriages bright they went their way."

skills.desc:
When played: Create 1 Toy Guard and add it to your Hand.
After your character uses an Elemental Skill: Spend 1 fewer Elemental Die the next time Toy Guard is played. (Cannot stack)
After your character uses an Elemental Burst: The next Toy Guard you play gains +1 to its number of effects. (Cannot stack)
